thread.section_title: Carid Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Carid | www.carid.com
thread.title: Michael Ferraro

author: Michael Ferraro
title: Michael Ferraro
text: I searched a lot of sites looking for vent shades for my 2017 LaCrosse and when I found Carid and the items they have available for it I stopped searching and ordered them right away. The price was better than a lot of other sites plus these go in the window channel and not on the outside of the car like most do. I will definitely be buying more from them and so should everyone. Their prices are very good.
